tweets.text: @StonebridgeLock @CanalRiverTrust @E17Wetlands @EnvAgency @sianberry Those are not bodged repair plates. They are plates put in place so that inexperienced or inattentive boaters don't get fenders snagged on the lock gate which cam and has sunk many boats. And it is inexperienced and inattentive boaters who do not shift fowl out during locking.

@MissMaisyDaisy @ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgencyMids @StinkStopthe @piersmorgan @SimonTagg @AaronBell4NUL #StopTheStench #WalleysQuarry

Also woke me up last night,like a big gas leak/burning oil smell .I am 2.9 miles away.
Sore throat and nose now,little sleep, 
lets play the Is it Covid or just pollution guessing game!!!!

Our fabulous #Lancashire field teams have removed this blockage from Savick Brook in #Preston today. 

Blockages like this one impact on the flow of our rivers and can increase #flood risk. 

If you see a blocked river, report it to us 24/7 on 0800 80 70 60. https://t.co/GGcIRXeITu

urls.title: Walleys Quarry Landfill Site - Latest Update - Environment Agency - Citizen Space
urls.description: Find and participate in consultations run by the Environment Agency

tweets.text:
In response to increased community concerns of odour at Walleys Quarry in Silverdale #NewcastleUnderLyme & surrounding area we have installed this air quality monitoring unit off Galingale View.

Read more ➡️ https://t.co/o558iAVicn

#Staffordshire @BBCRadioStoke @Sotlive https://t.co/BeeaGpjD6a

In October 2020, @EnvAgencyMids approved a permit application to increase to the amount of waste that can be disposed at the site from 250,000 tonnes to 400,000 tonnes per year.

https://t.co/t1dGnY7uvV

A thread about what's happening in Newcastle-under-Lyme. 

A local landfill #WalleysQuarry, operated by @RedIndustries2, has been the source of odour complaints from residents for several years, sometimes making national news: https://t.co/1o1YZkahuW

A huge line of debris left behind after the water recedes from the reservoir.  #StourFieldTeam worked hard raking, collecting and burning the green waste. #AldingtonReservoir #Ashford. ⁦@EnvAgencySE⁩ ⁦@AshfordCouncil⁩ ⁦@ADA_updates⁩ ⁦ https://t.co/aOMOLeXEPN

Praising work of River Severn Partnership & @EnvAgencyMids to @RishiSunak as I briefed him on the enormous economic benefits of finding a holistic solution to managing River Severn. The caucas of 44 River Severn constituency MPs which I Chair will continue to lobby Chancellor https://t.co/45exIrKT0N

entity.description: Good morning, Britain. Up early and need to catch up on the latest news, weather and sports? Then this weekday morning programme is for you, offering the latest information in such areas as entertainment, health and money. `Good Morning Britain' is the typical morning news and talk show. It features a number of presenters, correspondents and reporters covering what you should know to start your day before heading out the door.
